name: Knock On The Occult Door
description: Bind spirits. Weigh their pain. Each client arrives by appointment haunted, broken, or dangerous. In this gothic occult visual novel, you use protective accessories, read signs, and choose bindings that alter fate. Some seek redemption. Others hide darker truths. Your rituals may awaken the dead.

name: Öoo Soundtrack
description: It's the soundtrack of Öoo.

name: Astral Sanctum Demo
categories: Single-player;Game demo;Full controller support;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Playable without Timed Input

name: Toy's Playground: The prologue
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Subtitle Options;Family Sharing
description: Toy's Playground hides dark secrets. Explore the factory and the play area. Solve puzzles. Avoid the creatures. Don’t get caught. Find a way out before it’s too late.

name: Dancer
description: 《Dancer》是一款融合赛博朋克风格的交互式动感节奏AVG游戏，核心玩法为魔法舞蹈。通过精准的QTE按键触发角色华丽舞步，同时积累心桃能量；当心桃能量达到100%时，点击心桃图标，即可观看更华丽的舞蹈。游戏提供五位魅力舞者供您选择：神秘魅惑的魅影·璇玑、炽热耀眼的霓虹·燄姬、节奏强劲的玄鼓·敏雅、激情狂野的狂焰·斯嘉丽以及异域灵动的吠陀·莉拉。选择你的舞伴，用节奏点燃霓虹都市，开启魔法舞蹈之旅！

name: Steve Is Alone
description: Help Steve overcome obstacles and make friends in this challenging retro platform that challenges both veterans and newcomers!

name: Resonance Solstice
description: Resonance is a real-time trading RPG that blends real-time card battles with train-sim. As a COLUMBA conductor, reconnect a collapsing world by rail.

name: Dig Dig Spud Spud Harvest
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Mouse Only Option;Steam Leaderboards;Family Sharing
description: “Dig-Dig, Spud-Spud!” Dig up the ground and harvest the potato without damaging it! Sounds simple, but it's surprisingly tricky.

name: Hidden Paradise: Aloha with Love Collector's Edition
description: Relax in paradise with fun hidden object scenes, cozy puzzles, and a light island story. Your Hawaiian getaway starts now!

name: Omega Protocol Demo
description: "Choose, boost, survive!" Rogue-lite Co-op Action!! 3 rookies vs mutants with ONE shared power-up. Survive together by passing boost between teammates! Sniper needs precision? Give it! Tank under attack? Switch instantly! Steal power from allies or sacrifice yourself. Teamwork meets betrayal.

name: Worn By The Forgotten
description: "Worn" chosen by a forgotten goddess, will traverse this quiet, broken land in search of masks that hold the fragments of what once was. Explore a forgotten world, stand by the forgotten, and face the god who stole the world's identity.

name: MONOMOON
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: In MONOMOON, the way forward is reserved for the knowing and the daring. Guided by moonlight, you’ll uncover hidden truths and wander through a tiny and mysterious open world.

name: Card World
categories: Single-player;Steam Workshop;Includes level editor;Family Sharing;Steam Timeline
description: Card World is a card game entirely under your control. You can adventure in this card world, create new cards, new themes, new BGM, new backgrounds, and even make a completely new game.

name: SCP Containment Breach
description: In the original indie horror masterpiece that started it all, you're thrown into the boots of a Class D test subject. Enter a containment site of The SCP Foundation, a secret organization dedicated to containing and researching anomalous entities that threaten the normality of the world.

name: Critter Clash
categories: Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;LAN PvP;Shared/Split Screen PvP;Shared/Split Screen;Full controller support;In-App Purchases;Custom Volume Controls;Stereo Sound;Surround Sound;Remote Play Together
description: Multiplayer game to play with your friends

name: Blade Tempest
description: Blade Tempestis a 3D action Roguelike — tear through the cycle in an eternal storm, and carve your endless saga of slaughter with raging blades!

name: Well Dweller
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Well Dweller is a dark fairy-tale metroidvania full of charming characters living in a wretched kingdom. Play as Glimmer- a tiny bird armed with a matchstick- who must burn the wicked queen to save his family.
supported_languages: English;French;German;Spanish - Spain;Portuguese - Brazil;Russian;Simplified Chinese;Spanish - Latin America;Japanese;Korean;Portuguese - Portugal

name: Soulworld
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;Co-op;Online Co-op;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Stereo Sound;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Soulworld is a multiplayer RPG where players shape the realm building villages, creating Soulbeasts, and forging paths through combat, farming, trade, and exploration. Face the Ashen Circles and uncover secrets in a world driven by community and conflict

name: Shrike
description: Stalk the shadows in a medieval roguelike deckbuilder where stealth is your weapon. Pickpocket foes to build a deck of cunning abilities, turning their strengths against them in tactical, turn-based gameplay. Migrate across a wretched kingdom where every run writes a new, grim story of survival.

name: Hell is Us - Phol Guard Pack
description: Choose the Deluxe Edition of Hell is Us to get the Phol Guard Pack and other bonuses. The Phol Guard Pack includes an exclusive skin for Remi and his drone KAPI.
supported_languages: *;, French;*;, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese;*

name: LoveR Kiss Endless Memories
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Keyboard Only Option;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: Youth x Romance x Photography! "LoveR Kiss Endless Memories" is a romance simulation game in which the protagonist, a member of the photography club, deepens his bonds with seven heroines. You too can pursue your perfect photo and record an eternal summer.

name: Deathplane Demo
categories: Single-player;Game demo;Full controller support;Camera Comfort;Keyboard Only Option;Save Anytime
description: The demo for Deathplane allows you to play through the first world of the game.

name: Nullpoint Protocol
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;LAN Co-op;Shared/Split Screen Co-op;Shared/Split Screen;Full controller support;Family Sharing
description: The feeling of high-level MMO raids, without the grind. Nullpoint Protocol is a 1-4 player co-op action roguelite where you face harbingers of the apocalypse. Craft your own class from randomized loot, master each boss fight, and save your species from extinction!
supported_languages: *;, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese;*

name: Wedding Hall Simulator
description: Start from a poor wedding venue and rise to become the top wedding organizer in town! Greet clients, host henna nights and wedding events, manage food and music, collect gold, upgrade your hall. Wedding Hall Simulator lets you run the business your way!

name: PixelTorque Demo
categories: Single-player;Game demo;Steam Achievements;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Save Anytime;Touch Only Option;Stats
description: PixelTorque is a retro-style, 2D drag racing game developed by IndieGameStudio. Players build, customize, and race pixelated cars across neon-lit streets, focusing on tuning engines, mastering manual shifting, managing fuel, and climbing global leaderboards.

name: DAVE a nice guy
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Family Sharing
description: fast paced action game

name: Monster Looter
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud
description: Kill monsters. Get loot. Get stronger. Then what? Kill BIGGER monsters. Get EVEN MORE loot. Upgrade. Upgrade again. Keep looting. Keep growing. How powerful will you be? Become the best monster looter in the world!

name: Built Brick by Brick
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: A life simulation and construction game set in rural Argentina. You start with a plot of land and the idea of your dream home. Work to earn money and achieve your goals.

name: Beaver Creek
categories: Single-player;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Partial Controller Support;Family Sharing
description: A casual 3D Platforming adventure about a beaver on a journey to find a new home. Waddle, jump, and bounce your way through the wilderness. Harness the power of water physics to overcome obstacles. Meet cute animals, avoid ghosts from the past, and gnaw your way to a brighter future!

name: Killer Situation
description: On a snowy night just before Christmas, your smart home is breached. A serial killer has come for you - and you are trapped with him in your own house. Outsmart, hide, or fight your way out in this short, intense horror experience.

name: Deathplane
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Camera Comfort;Keyboard Only Option;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Deathplane is a 2D puzzle-platformer game about moving the actual deathplane below the level up and down to kill enemies and find solutions and secrets.

name: The Fame Game
description: The player becomes Jonathan, a former “ordinary man” who has just been cast as the main character in the country’s hottest television show. As he climbs the Hollywood ladder to stardom, he meets seven beauties vying to be his leading lady. Who will you choose? The adventure is up to you…

name: Everlusting Life - Mascot Polly
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;Downloadable Content;Steam Achievements;In-App Purchases;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Touch Only Option
description: Unlock a unique mascot Polly to see her on the home screen every time you log in! Who knows, this darling lamb might just become your new favorite?

name: Frutigeropolis: The Promised City
description: Step into a serene, surreal city of the old future. Explore environments shaped by the soul of Frutiger design. Slow down inside a world built to be remembered.

name: PIG
description: In a final bid to cheat death, you challenge The Alleyman to a high-stakes dice game where every roll could be your last.

name: Rhell: Warped Worlds & Troubled Times
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Create unique spells by combining magical runes to solve puzzles your way. Transform objects, manipulate time, and discover the mysteries of a world where everyone has vanished, leaving only 12 people behind. Every puzzle has multiple solutions - if you can imagine it, you can probably do it.

name: Out Of Water Demo
categories: Game demo;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud
description: OUT OF WATER is a visual novel about survival, myths, love, and choice. In 1 CE Watarholt, a quiet village prepares for winter - until bodies begin to surface. Shape your path through bonds, ancient horrors, and a fading peace. Will you fight, plead, or surrender to the waters?

name: Strange Pet World - Stage2 ITEM
description: An item that can be used to randomly evolve into a 2nd stage pet

name: Midnight Murder Maze
description: You find yourself darkened maze at the stroke of midnight. But the wolves howling, the blades sharpening and the crows calling out tell you that you are not alone. The only question that remains is how many times will you die before you stumble, at last, upon the exit to this fiendish construction.

name: Echoes of Seasons
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Stats
description: In order to restore the fertility of your town's land, play the role of a reckless young man who, with Demeter's blessing, can change the seasons. Put your observation and logic skills to good use in this single-player 3D puzzle game!

name: Edge Of Evil
description: An ancient seal has been broken upon entering a locked crypt and now the shadows of darkness have been unleashed into the mortal world. Buried among the graves and beneath the ash of a dead city lies an eclipse that will soon come from the depths and beyond the edge of evil.

name: Everlast: Undying Tale
description: Everlast: Undying Tale is a multiplayer action RPG in a handcrafted open world. Balance the powers of an eldritch Curse against its affect on your humanity to soar to new heights of heroism with combat, crafting, and questing in this homage to classic MMO systems.

name: Evil Advisor Verdict
description: As the king’s — for now — trusted advisor, you judge people at the royal tribunal… but justice isn't your goal. Execute the kind, spare the wicked, and plunge the kingdom into chaos.
